nomeR 0.6.0
  • Reference

Reference

All functions

add_joint_probs_and_MI()

Add to a data.frame with empirical joint frequencies columns with empirical joint probabilities as well as mutual information

calculate_theor_joint_probs()

Function for calculating theoretical joint probabilities at certain distance

count_joint_frequencies()

Create count table for 00, 01, 10, 11, etc occurences in NOMe-Seq data

fit_background_mixmodel_from_aggreg_table()

Title

fit_background_mixture_model()

Fit background model

fit_betabinom_model()

Estimate parameters for beta-binomial distribution

generate_synthetic_NOMe_data()

Generate synthetic NOMe-Seq like dataset

get_cooccurrence_ctable_from_bams()

Fetch co-occurrence of GCH protection states from BAM files

get_data_matrix_from_bams()

Fetch data matrix from NOMe-seq BAM files for set of regions

get_ftp_inference_summary()

Extract and/or plot estimates from footprint inference and identify potential footprints from spectrum

get_ftp_models_for_prediction()

Create parameters for predict_footprints using footprints summary returned by get_ftp_inference_summary

get_protect_stats_table_from_bams()

Fetch protection aggregated statistics from NOMe-seq BAM files

infer_footprints_stan_optimizing()

Finding point estimate for footprint abundance using STAN optimization algorithm

infer_footprints_stan_sampling()

Bayesian inference of footprint abundance using STAN algorithms

infer_footprints_stan_vb()

Black-box Variational Bayes for inference of footprint abundance using STAN Automatic Differentiation Variational Inference (ADVI) algorithm

init_ftp_abundance_for_inference()

Create initial values for footprint inference

nomeR

nomeR: Probabilistic model for NOME-Seq data analysis

predict_footprints()

Function for running probabilistic model to predict binding sites of DNA binding proteins in NOMe-Seq data

suggest_footprints()

Suggest footprints using inferred spectrum

truncate_footprint_overhangs()

Truncate protected positions from left and right sides

validate_data_for_predict()

Checks and prepares data structure for c++ run_cpp_nomeR function
